scripts.test:setupFunctional: npx @puppeteer/browsers install chrome@123 --platform linux; npx @puppeteer/browsers install chromedriver@123 --platform linux; TESTS_FOR_ACCESSIBILITY='true'; NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=8192';
scripts.test:appealFullfunctional: yarn create:testCounter; yarn test:setupFunctional; node e2e/cucumberTagSearcher.js @appeal-nightly-test; protractor e2e/features.parallel.linux.conf.js --cucumberOpts.tags=@appeal-nightly-test --cucumberOpts.tags=~@OnlyIfSaveAndContinueIsEnabled
scripts.test:bailFullfunctional: yarn create:testCounter; yarn test:setupFunctional; node e2e/cucumberTagSearcher.js @bail-nightly-test; protractor e2e/features.parallel.linux.conf.js --cucumberOpts.tags=@bail-nightly-test --cucumberOpts.tags=~@OnlyIfSaveAndContinueIsEnabled
scripts.test:linuxFullfunctional: npx @puppeteer/browsers install chrome@123 --platform linux; npx @puppeteer/browsers install chromedriver@123 --platform linux; TESTS_FOR_ACCESSIBILITY='true'; NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=8192'; node e2e/cucumberTagSearcher.js @TAG-TO-CHANGE; protractor e2e/features.parallel.mac.conf.js --cucumberOpts.tags=@TAG-TO-CHANGE --cucumberOpts.tags=~@OnlyIfSaveAndContinueIsEnabled
scripts.test:macFullfunctional: npx @puppeteer/browsers install chrome@123 --platform mac; npx @puppeteer/browsers install chromedriver@123 --platform mac; TESTS_FOR_ACCESSIBILITY='true'; NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=8192'; node e2e/cucumberTagSearcher.js @TAG-TO-CHANGE; protractor e2e/features.parallel.mac.conf.js --cucumberOpts.tags=@TAG-TO-CHANGE --cucumberOpts.tags=~@OnlyIfSaveAndContinueIsEnabled
scripts.test:windowsFullfunctional: npx @puppeteer/browsers install chrome@123 --platform win64; npx @puppeteer/browsers install chromedriver@123 --platform win64; TESTS_FOR_ACCESSIBILITY='true'; NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=8192'; node e2e/cucumberTagSearcher.js @TAG-TO-CHANGE; protractor e2e/features.parallel.windows.conf.js --cucumberOpts.tags=@TAG-TO-CHANGE --cucumberOpts.tags=~@OnlyIfSaveAndContinueIsEnabled
